scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This folder contains several letters and a pass from the Confederate Army Provost Marshall for Captain Charlton H. Morgan to visit Nashville, Tennessee. Many of the letters discuss the events of the Civil War. Several letters are written to members of the Morgan and Howard families. A letter to Henrietta Duke reveals that her brother, Major John Hunt Morgan, is engaged and will marry soon (February 17, 1863). Edward Lloyd Howard wrote a letter to his mother, Elizabeth Phoebe Key Howard, informing her he had recovered from his illness and been promoted to Chief Surgeon of Artillery of Jackson's Corps (March 1, 1863).
